page.title: 14POLICE STATION, HEMEL
page.content: {Hemel Hempstead Police Station (Marlowes) consists of lots of different departments. They have a {telex system}through which they can contact any police station in Hertfordshire. There is a{finger-print department, where prints are taken and put on police records. The{cells}are fairly clean and each cell has a toilet in it, with a wooden seat. At the end of the corridor there is a shower. That is the only place where prisoners can wash. Men and womens' cells are separate. In the police station there is a large{blackboard}which says which beats all the different policemen are on. These are just a few of the important things about our police station.
